message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would really be valuable to you. I'm asking for $200 to start.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $160?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still looking for a better deal. I am willing to pay $140 for the product.
